column1: Uchi////Moving on to the Sushi portion of our night. If you are already at this restaurant
column2: please give it a try to eat some raw fish. Don't be like everyone sitting around us who ordered 7 rolls between two people. This restaurant has excellent sushi chefs who understand a good cut of fish
column3: how to approach the flavor correctly
column4: and how to create a new spin on the typical taste. I would recommend ordering off of the select menu which lists the freshest fish
column5: and newest options. By doing so
column6: we paid a few dollars more
column7: but had a far more satisfying meal.
